title: Google\Cloud\LifeSciences\V2beta\Mount
name: Mount
description:
Carries information about a particular disk mount inside a container.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.lifesciences.v2beta.Mount

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.disk
params.description: The name of the disk to mount, as specified in the resources section.

params.name: data.path
params.description: The path to mount the disk inside the container.

params.name: data.read_only
params.description: If true, the disk is mounted read-only inside the container.
